Name: Iris Covenant –Song of the Forgotten Heroes–
About the game: Story You accepted a request to save the world from a religious group called Levin Relief Society. Ancient mysteries and unknown dangers are waiting for you ahead the journey. System Old School RPG -The gender of the main character is secectable. -Except main boss units, all enmey units could turn to be your allies. -New round bonus and multiple endings. -More bonus characters unlocked after the 1st round.
